observations: All modules imported successfully without errors
Player movement mechanism verified with boundary checking
Shooting mechanism verified - bullets fire and move correctly
Alien movement system verified - horizontal movement with edge detection
Bunker damage system working - health decrements and visual feedback
Particle explosion system working - particles fade over lifetime
Level progression working - level increments, new aliens spawn with increased difficulty
Player death and respawn system working
Entity cleanup working - inactive objects removed from lists
Scoring system verified - correct points awarded by alien row
conclusion: The Vector Space Invaders Shoot application successfully passed all runtime tests. The application initializes correctly, all basic functionality is working as expected, including player movement with boundary checking, shooting mechanics, alien AI with horizontal movement and edge detection, collision detection, scoring system (30/20/10 points by row), bunker damage system with visual feedback, particle explosion effects, level progression with increasing difficulty, and game state management. The code structure is well-organized with proper separation of concerns between config, entities, game logic, and main entry point.
